metadata.name: Moth & Whisper
metadata.description:
Everyone knows that the two greatest thieves in the city are the Moth and the Whisper. What nobody knows is that the Moth and Whisper disappeared months ago and the new Moth and Whisper is actually one person pretending to be both of them: Niki, the child of the Moth and the Whisper. 

The truth about Niki’s parents and their disappearance is out there, but can Niki survive long enough to find it?
